00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Function: MCAPISourceWidget()
00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 MCAPISourceWidget::MCAPISourceWidget(QString const& sourceFile,
00034                                      QSharedPointer<MCAPIContentMatcher> mcapiMatcher,
00035                                      QWidget* mainWnd, QWidget* parent) : TabDocument(parent, DOC_PRINT_SUPPORT | DOC_EDIT_SUPPORT),
00036                                                                           sourceFile_(sourceFile),
00037                                                                           editProvider_()
00038 {
00039     textEdit_ = new MCAPITextEdit(mcapiMatcher, mainWnd, this);
00040     editProvider_ = QSharedPointer<TextEditProvider>(new TextEditProvider(*textEdit_));
00041 
00042         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00043     layout->addWidget(textEdit_);
00044 
00045     QSettings settings;
00046     applySettings(settings);
00047     
00048     // Read the contents of the file to the text edit.
00049     QFile file(sourceFile);
00050 
00051     bool success = file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text);
00052     Q_ASSERT(success);
00053 
00054     QTextStream stream(&file);
00055     textEdit_->setPlainText(stream.readAll());
00056 
00057     setDocumentName(QFileInfo(sourceFile).fileName());
00058     setDocumentType("Code");
00059 
00060     connect(textEdit_->document(), SIGNAL(contentsChanged()),
00061             this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062     connect(this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00063         this, SLOT(onContentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00064 }

00071 }

00073 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 // Function: loadSettings()
00075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 void MCAPISourceWidget::applySettings(QSettings const& settings)
00077 {
00078     // Read indentation settings.
00079     MCAPITextEdit::IndentStyle style =
00080         static_cast<MCAPITextEdit::IndentStyle>(settings.value("editor/indentStyle",
00081                                                                MCAPITextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES).toInt());
00082     unsigned int width = settings.value("editor/indentWidth", 4).toInt();    
00083     textEdit_->setIndentStyle(style, width);
00084 
00085     // Read font settings.
00086     QFont font = settings.value("editor/font", QFont("Courier New", 10)).value<QFont>();
00087     textEdit_->setFont(font);
00088 
00089     // Read highlight style settings.
00090     qRegisterMetaTypeStreamOperators<HighlightStyleDesc>("HighlightStyleDesc");
00091 
00092     for (int i = 0; i < MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_COUNT; ++i)
00093     {
00094         HighlightStyleDesc styleDesc = settings.value("editor/highlight/" + MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_IDS[i],
00095             QVariant::fromValue(MCAPIHighlighter::DEFAULT_STYLES[i])).value<HighlightStyleDesc>();
00096 
00097         textEdit_->getHighlighter().setStyle(static_cast<MCAPIHighlighter::StyleType>(i), styleDesc);
00098     }
00099 
00100     textEdit_->getHighlighter().applyStyles();
00101 }

00103 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 // Function: getSourceFile()
00105 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 QString const& MCAPISourceWidget::getSourceFile() const
00107 {
00108     return sourceFile_;
00109 }
00110 
00111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 // Function: save()
00113 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 bool MCAPISourceWidget::save()
00115 {
00116     QFile file(sourceFile_);
00117 
00118     // Check if the file could not be opened.
00119     if (!file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Text))
00120     {
00121         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00122                            tr("Unable to save source file ") + sourceFile_ +
00123                            tr("! The file may be read only."), QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00124 
00125         msgBox.exec();
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128 
00129     file.write(textEdit_->toPlainText().toStdString().c_str());
00130 
00131     return TabDocument::save();
00132 }
00133 
00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 // Function: print()
00136 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 void MCAPISourceWidget::print()
00138 {
00139     QPrinter printer;
00140 
00141     // Query the user for printing settings.
00142     QPrintDialog dlg(&printer, this);
00143     dlg.setWindowTitle(tr("Print Source Document"));
00144 
00145     if (textEdit_->textCursor().hasSelection())
00146     {
00147         dlg.addEnabledOption(QAbstractPrintDialog::PrintSelection);
00148     }
00149 
00150     if (dlg.exec() != QDialog::Accepted)
00151     {
00152         return;
00153     }
00154     
00155     // Print the document.
00156     textEdit_->print(&printer);
00157 }
